item.title: OSPF
item.description: OSPF notes Troubleshooting Neighborship problems checklist Source: iNET ZERO Interfaces present in [edit protocols ospf] Interfaces are not passive Interfaces are not down No FF is blocking OSPF protocol 89 Area mismatch Timer mismatch Auth. mismatch Area type mismatch Subnet mask mismatch Duplicate router-id MTU mismatch DR priority = 0 on both routers Duplicate interface ip address Interface type mismatch Tools Show commands. Traceoptions. Monitor traffic interface.
